Changelog
=========

0.2 (2010-03-01)
----------------

* Code base has been cleaned to be pep8 compliant.

* We are now using the ``zope.size.ISized`` adaptation to get the size
  of the file to display.

* Cleaned dependencies. zope.app dependencies have been severed when
  possible.


0.1 (2009-10-21)
----------------

* Initial release
